question.question-text: 1. Why does the student go to see the professor?

answer-list.answer-text: To take a test he has missed
To get permission to write about a particular topic
To ask a question about material from the course text
To ask why certain material has been assigned

question.question-text: 2. What is the topic of the paper he wants to write?

answer-list.answer-text: The use of stars in navigation
Various positions in the Roman military
The importance of astronomy in ancient Rome
A method of determining the roles for certain soldiers

question.question-text: 3. Why were Roman soldiers asked to count the stars in the Big Dipper?

answer-list.answer-text: To determine if they could use the stars to navigate
To determine if they were knowledgeable about constellations
To determine if they could see well at long distances
To determine if they could count

question.question-text: 4. Which of the following is NOT true?

answer-list.answer-text: The Big Dipper is part of a binary star.
Mizar is part of the Big Dipper.
Alcor is part of a binary star.
The Big Dipper contains a number of stars.

question.question-text: 5. What two statements describe possible outcomes from the Roman eyesight test?

answer-list.answer-text: A soldier would fight as an archer.
A soldier would fight on horseback.
A soldier would become an officer.
A soldier would fight on the front lines.

question.question-text: 6. How does the term "survival of the fittest" relate to the test that the student describes?

answer-list.answer-text: The soldiers in the best physical shape tended to survive in battles.
The soldiers with better eyesight would fight from less dangerous positions.
The fittest Romans were not in the military and therefore tended to survive.
Those who could not see Alcor did not survive the Roman military tests.

question.question-text: 7. What does the professor finally decide?

answer-list.answer-text: That the topic is not related to anthropology
That the student should not use the topic for his paper
That the student should concentrate on the concept of survival of the fittest
That it is possible to use this topic for the paper
